Card

Card Title

This is a standard Sport Wales card component. It uses the .sw-card class for consistent padding, background, and shadows.

Read more

When to use this component

Use the card component to present information in a structured, visually appealing format. Cards work well for displaying related content like services, features, or key information that users need to scan quickly.

Cards are particularly effective for landing pages, service overviews, and content that benefits from visual hierarchy and clear separation.

How it works

Cards should present information clearly and consistently. Follow these guidelines for effective card design:

  • Use consistent card dimensions for visual harmony (recommended width: 296px for content area)
  • Include a clear, descriptive heading that summarizes the card content
  • Keep description text concise but informative
  • Use Sport Wales brand colors: teal (#14B8A6) for primary cards
  • Include visual elements (graphics/icons) to enhance understanding
  • Ensure adequate padding for comfortable reading (35-40px)
  • Use white text on colored backgrounds for optimal contrast
  • Consider responsive design for different screen sizes
  • Group related cards together for better user experience
  • Use consistent typography (Montserrat font family)
  • Include visual cues like graphics to support the content
  • Test card layouts across different devices and screen sizes

Interactive Features

  • ✓ Visual graphics enhance content understanding
  • ✓ Consistent spacing and typography for professional appearance
  • ✓ Responsive design adapts to different screen sizes
  • ✓ Clear content hierarchy with heading and description
  • ✓ Sport Wales brand color implementation
  • ✓ Shadow effects for visual depth and separation
  • ✓ Scalable vector graphics for crisp display at any size
  • ✓ Accessible color contrast ratios

Card with Interactive Arrow

Use this card variant when you want to indicate that the card is clickable or leads to more detailed information. The arrow provides a visual cue for user interaction.

Grants & funding

We distribute funding to community clubs, volunteers, and athletes. Our grants team can support you with information.

Sport Wales Guidelines

  • Cards should work best on content with a 1440px width for optimal desktop display
  • Use teal (#14B8A6) as the primary background color for consistency with Sport Wales branding
  • Maintain consistent padding of 35-40px for comfortable content spacing
  • Include visual graphics to enhance content understanding and brand identity
  • Ensure white text on colored backgrounds meets accessibility contrast requirements
  • Use Montserrat font family for all card text to maintain brand consistency
  • Consider hover states for interactive cards to provide clear user feedback
  • Test card layouts across different devices to ensure responsive behavior
  • Group related cards together for improved user experience and content organization
  • Use consistent card dimensions within the same layout for visual harmony
